hero.description: Student of Higher Technician in Software Analysis and Development. Passionate about creating innovative digital solutions with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and modern technologies.

projects.title: Heavy Machinery Management System
projects.description: Web application developed with PHP and Laravel for heavy machinery management. Includes authentication, user CRUD, file management, and admin panel with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Battleship Game
projects.description: The classic Battleship game, created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features interactive boards, game logic, and responsive design.

projects.description: Data Analytics project on Female Representation in Video Games as per Jump! Data Analytics certification.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Modern and responsive portfolio website built with React, featuring smooth animations, internationalization support, and a clean, professional design. Showcases my projects, skills, and experience in an interactive way.

contact.workDescription: I'm always interested in new projects and learning opportunities. Whether you need web development, data analysis, or just want to chat about technology, feel free to contact me.

skills.title: Technical Skills

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me and my development experience
about.description1: Student of Higher Technician in Software Analysis and Development at Instituto Superior Sedes Sapientiae, with expected graduation in 2025. I'm passionate about creating innovative and efficient digital solutions.
about.description2: I have experience in web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, as well as data analysis with SQL and Power BI. I've also worked with languages like PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and C#.
about.description3: I specialize in web development and programming, but also in data analysis. I'm always learning new technologies to stay up-to-date in this constantly evolving field.

experiences.title: Web Development
experiences.description: Experience in designing and developing web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to create modern and responsive interfaces.

experiences.title: Data Analysis
experiences.description: Specialized in advanced use of SQL for organizing and analyzing large volumes of data, and creating interactive dashboards with Power BI.

experiences.title: Backend Programming
experiences.description: Knowledge in PHP, Python, and C#. Experience with frameworks like Laravel and game development in C#.

experiences.title: Emerging Technologies
experiences.description: Experience in Python for industry 4.0, including object detection coding through video and automations.
